get.summary: Get a list of taxonomies

parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.
parameters.name: X-Request-Id

digitalStamp.description: If the payment needs a tax stamp, mutually exclusive with digitalStampRestriction

digitalStampRestriction.description: If the payment can be payed only with a tax stamp, mutually exclusive with digitalStamp

idBrokerPsp.description: TaxCode of the linked broker PSP

maxPaymentAmount.description: Maximum commission fee that can bee applied

minPaymentAmount.description: Minimum commission fee that can be applied

paymentType.description: Payment type for which the bundle can be applied

touchpoint.description: Touch-point where the bundle can be applied

transferCategoryList.description: List of taxonomies that relates to the bundle

items.description: List of taxonomies that relates to the bundle

validityDateFrom.description: Date from which the bundle is valid

validityDateTo.description: Date after which the bundle is expired

abi.description: Italian Banking Association numeric code used to identify banks or credit institutions

digitalStamp.description: If the payment needs a tax stamp, mutually exclusive with digitalStampRestriction

digitalStampRestriction.description: If the payment can be payed only with a tax stamp, mutually exclusive with digitalStamp

idBrokerPsp.description: TaxCode of the linked broker PSP

maxPaymentAmount.description: Maximum commission fee that can bee applied

minPaymentAmount.description: Minimum commission fee that can be applied

paymentType.description: Payment type for which the bundle can be applied

pspBusinessName.description: Business name of the linked broker PSP

touchpoint.description: Touch-point where the bundle can be applied

transferCategoryList.description: List of taxonomies that relates to the bundle

items.description: List of taxonomies that relates to the bundle

validityDateFrom.description: Date from which the bundle is valid

validityDateTo.description: Date after which the bundle is expired

BundleRequest.description: Commissional bundle related to PSP to be created

detail.description: A human readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: There was an error processing the request

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

title.description: A short, summary of the problem type. Written in english and readable for engineers (usually not suited for non technical stakeholders and not localized); example: Service Unavailable

SubKey.description: The Azure Subscription Key to access this API.
SubKey.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
